data.prayer: There are 169,000 people living in the state of Zamboanga Sibugay. Only about 23,541 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zamboanga Sibugay, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Zamboanga Sibugay, Philippines to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Zamboanga Sibugay, Philippines.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Zamboanga Sibugay do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Zamboanga Sibugay, Philippines be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Molbog people. Make the Molbog people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Zamboanga Sibugay that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Zamboanga Sibugay, Philippines.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zamboanga Sibugay, Philippines has a population of 169,000.

We estimate Zamboanga Sibugay has 23,541 people who might know Jesus, 130,190 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 15,269 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Zamboanga Sibugay, Philippines. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
